description_for_human: Find local businesses and get directions. Search for restaurants, shops, services, and more near you with an interactive map.
description_for_model: LocalHub helps users find nearby businesses, restaurants, shops, and services. It provides search results with ratings, addresses, and phone numbers. Users can view results on an interactive map, get directions, and filter by rating or open hours. Best for queries like 'find restaurants near me', 'show cafes in [location]', 'where is the nearest pharmacy', etc.

search_places.description: Search for local businesses by type and location

parameters.open_now: Filter to only businesses open now
parameters.sort_by: Sort by relevance, rating, or distance

get_place_details.description: Get detailed information about a specific business

parameters.place_id: Google Maps place ID from search results

get_directions.description: Get directions from origin to destination

compose_map_resource.description: Create an interactive fullscreen map with search results

parameters.state_id: Session state ID from search results

conversation_starters: I need a gym near Mission Bay
